name: War Mechs
description:
War Mechs | SideQuest (sidequestvr.com)

Have you always been looking forward to personally controlling a mecha to fight the enemy?

Have you ever fantasized about being a mecha pilot and becoming a hero?

I love all mechas, all huge robots just as much as you do. Now I invite you to drive mechas in VR and fight together.

It is not a third person, there is no complicated mirror movement, only a narrow cockpit and huge mecha.
